      • CreateOrder

        static java.util.Optional<Order> CreateOrder​(TransactionMode mode,
                                             java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​Currency> currencyMap)
        Method to create the actual order
        Parameters:
        mode - a TransactionMode defining the mode if buy or sell currency.
        currencyMap - a Map of String(Site ie SOUTH) and Currency(holding the supported currencies)
        Returns:
        a Order holding all the necessary details for further processing
